Title: Reservoir Dogs
Overview: A botched robbery indicates a police informant, and the pressure mounts in the aftermath at a warehouse. Crime begets violence as the survivors -- veteran Mr. White, newcomer Mr. Orange, psychopathic parolee Mr. Blonde, bickering weasel Mr. Pink and Nice Guy Eddie -- unravel.
Keywords: traitor, jewelry, psychopath, thief, heist, betrayal, mystery, escape, gang, plan gone wrong, warehouse, ensemble cast, all male cast, told in flashback, heist gone wrong, foreshadowing, rendezvous, iconic, set in one room, uneasy alliance, rag tag group
production_companies: Live Entertainment, Lionsgate, Dog Eat Dog Productions Inc.
Cast: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen
